TopicTitle: Infernal Robotics Rework Trailer - Sampling Duna

Articles.Content:
Hi All,

I thought I would share this video. It's made by Darren9 as a trailer for my mod, but I think it's cool enough to show off on its own here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yxh9En_Rd6E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Enjoy!

-Zodius

Ok, ok, I will download Infernal Robotics tomorrow and include it in my upcoming mission for Sarnus (from Outer Planets mod) powered by Near Future. I just hope that nobody will make video like this about TAC lifesupport. That was wonderful! Maybe best KSP video I have ever seen.

--- I am becoming strange on next lines ---

Or best video ever. NASA should learn from it. ESA should learn from it. If Obama have seen this, he would certainly give more money to NASA. People should really stop all wars and start making Infernal Robotics in real life. Seriously. Ok, not seriously. It would be however nice. But unrealistic. Why is mankind so stupid and don't unite? Ok nevermind, I am not going to start discussion about this. It won't change anything if we talk how world could be awesome. Stop, Nik333. Stop writing. Ok, I am calming down! I am calming down...

--- Edit ---

Sorry, get too emotional yesterday... It is trully awesome video. As every video should be. Every second has something moving. Something interesting. That's awesome...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-04T09:04:55Z" title="04/04/2015 09:04  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 4, 2015</time> by Nik333**

Thanks, Zodius is playing himself down a bit though, there's designs, direction and lots of other stuff in there that I wouldn't even of tried on my own, I'm very pleased with the result though ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Wow that was a really great video. I have always avoided the IR mod because I always worry about complicated mods making the game crash or corrupting save files, not to mention I have to limit part count on my crafts to keep the game from being too slow. This video just tipped the scales. It is worth the risk. When 1.0 comes out I will try adding 1.0 to the game. Really great video, and those parts look great!
